modName: Alternative Start - Kafiir a thief - RP
summary: A lone thief from Elswyer who ran into some trouble with the law is now in deep with the Skyrim Thieves Guild
descriptionHtml:
Born in the city of Dune, Elswyer, Ka\'fiir was quickly orphaned when his parents died on one of their trips on trading caravans.  Seeing no other way to support himself, he turned to crime.  He was doing well until he finally got caught.  Ka\'fiir made it away but decided it would be too dangerous to return to Elsweyr.  Deciding backup would be nice he traveled to Riften to join up with the thieves guild.  After a while of living there a dragon was spoted flying over head towards the north west.  The jarl put out a well payed job to take a message to Whiterun about the dragon.  Ka\'fiir took the job and is just starting his journey to Whiterun when you, the player, take over.  


This is an alternative start save.  His skills are:
All magic skills at 0 because Khajiits are known poor magic users
Lockpicking, Pickpocketing, and Speech are at 30 since these are traits all good thieves need
Alchemy is at 20 because of the occasional brewing of a skill enhancing potion
Sneak is at 40 since above all other skills this is the one thieves need most
Block and One Handed are at 10 for the off hand chance that he will need to defend himself
Light Armor is at 30 for the occasional tussle
Archery is at 20 just incase he needs to take out a few bandits during tomb looting

Credits:
AOF Believable Hair-Female and Male- (I used this to boost the hair quality in the screenshot)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307
